appTitle: Messenger – Text and Video Chat for Free
text: very easy way to communicate with friend and family able to create group to easily share information of the same type able to audio and video chat if you send a message to the wrong person you can delete a message prior to the person seeing a message you can choose your friend and family you can also block your friend and family or delete them all together i use this application much much more than email i love this application another benefit sharing picture greeting article and sticker very fun and easy application to use
original_text: Very easy way to communicate with friends and family. Able to create groups to easily share information of the same type. Able to audio and video chat. If you send a message to the wrong person, you can delete it, prior to the person seeing it. You can choose your friends and family, you can also block them or delete them all together. I use this app. much, much more than e-mail. I love it. Another benefit, sharing pictures, greetings, articles and stickers. Very fun and easy app. to use.

And I'm annoyed to see a Messenger prompt show up when texting someone in Facebook. Plus, I do not like the advertisments in my contact list.

text: not optimized for chromebok the layout is not visually pleasing or easy to use the font is small the text bubble are far too wide and skinny and for some reason the font is not easy to edit your text once you have typed your text it is hard to select letter or word for some reason and near impossible to move thing around if you want to change what you have written before sending your text overall using the messenger application on a chromebok is very clumsy and irritating
original_text: Not optimized for Chromebook. The layout is not visually pleasing or easy to use. The font is small, the text bubbles are far too wide and skinny, and for some reason, it is not easy to edit your text once you have typed it. It's hard to select letters or words, for some reason, and near impossible to move things around if you want to change what you've written before sending it. Overall, using the Messenger app on a Chromebook is very clumsy and irritating.

text: to get the notification sound back go to your top left hand corner tap on your image scroll to notification and sound tap it scroll down to manage notification tap it in application notification page tap chat and call tap important tap high back to application notification page tap group chat mention follow same procedure of number row back to application notification page scroll to silent notification and turn same procedure of number off you should be able to receive notification again
original_text: To get the notification sound back. 1) Go to your top left hand corner tap on your image. 2) Scroll to "Notification & Sound" tap it. 3) Scroll down to "Manage Notification" tap it. 4)In App Notification page. Tap "Chat and call", tap "Important", tap "high". 5)Back to App Notification page tap "Group chat mentions" follow same procedue of number 4) row. 6)Back to App Notification page, scroll to "Silent notification" and turn it off. You should be able to receive notification again.

text: face-on messenger commonly known a messenger is a messaging application and platform originally developed a face-on chat in face-on chat in revamped face-on chat in messaging service in and subsequently released standalone io and android aps in august over the year face-on has released new aps on a variety of different operating system launched a dedicated webster interface and separated the messaging functionality from the main face-on application requiring user to use the web interface
original_text: Facebook Messenger (commonly known as Messenger)[5] is a messaging app and platform. Originally developed as Facebook Chat in 2008, the company revamped its messaging service in 2010, and subsequently released standalone iOS and Android apps in August 2011. Over the years, Facebook has released new apps on a variety of different operating systems, launched a dedicated website interface, and separated the messaging functionality from the main Facebook app, requiring users to use the web interface

original_text: In the recent update so far the app has been really good.My girlfriend is currently with some family overseas and its been great to be able to still talk and message with her. But there are a few things that I keep having problems with.  First off I keep having problems with the active status not showing things correctly. The active status either keeps staying active over night when she is not using her phone. Which has been making it so that when I go to messege her I end up waking her up because I can't tell if she is sleeping or not.  The second problem I keep having with it is that her active status and last active times keeps vanishing completely even though she has the app open in the background and its only been minutes since the last time we messeged each other.  With the exceptions of these two things, the app has been great and I am really happy its around.
